original_text: And when he returned to Capernaum after some days, it was reported that he was at home.
korean_text: 수 일 후에 예수께서 다시 가버나움에 들어가시니 집에 계시다는 소문이 들린지라

sentences.original_text: And when he returned to Capernaum after some days,
sentences.korean_translation: 며칠 후에 그가 가버나움에 다시 돌아왔을 때,

sentences.original_text: it was reported that he was at home.
